channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Michigan fails in bid to build semiconductor manufacturing plant, Whitmer blames ‘massive economic uncertainty’
item.description: The news quickly set off dueling political statements from Republicans and Democrats in the state.

item.title: Using ChatGPT for stock-market advice? Here’s how Wall Street pros do it.

item.title: Trump brokers deal for Coca-Cola to use ‘REAL Cane Sugar’ in U.S. Coke products
item.description: First it was the Gulf of Mexico, now Trump is coming for "Mexican Coke."

item.title: Coke tight-lipped on Trump’s promise to make American Coke with real sugar again

item.title: Trump says he ‘talked about the concept of firing’ Jerome Powell. Stocks went for a ride

item.title: Nasdaq closes at record as stocks climb after Trump denies plan to fire Powell
